product_name: Acorn Nex Tex Clog Slippers - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The women's Acorn Next Tex clog slippers treat your feet to richly textured, faux fleece uppers with moisture-wicking linings, contoured footbeds and weatherproof soles for indoor and outdoor wear. Polyester and acrylic faux fleece uppers and polyester microfleece linings insulate and draw moisture away from the skin to help keep your feet warm and dry. Contoured, polyurethane footbeds feature enhanced heel and arch areas for long-wearing comfort. Nonslip, weatherproof thermoplastic rubber outsoles. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Acorn Next Tex clog slippers treat your feet to richly textured, faux fleece uppers with moisture-wicking linings, contoured footbeds and weatherproof soles for indoor and outdoor wear.
